alert.note: Alert for Howard (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 6:24PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Howard County through 715 PM CDT... At 624 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Forsan, or near Big Spring, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Spring, Coahoma, Forsan, Sand Springs, Luther, Big Spring Country Club, Big Spring McMahon-Wrinkle Airpark and Vealmoor. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 174 and 193. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
